keyMoments.title: Ivankov's Sacrificial Battle
keyMoments.description: Revolutionary Army Commander Ivankov stays behind to fight Magellan, sacrificing himself to help Luffy escape.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Revolutionary Army's commitment to supporting Dragon's son and their willingness to make great sacrifices for the cause.

keyMoments.title: Ivankov Defeated by Magellan
keyMoments.description: Despite his best efforts, Ivankov is defeated and poisoned by Warden Magellan.
keyMoments.significance: A major setback for the Revolutionary Army with one of their commanders severely injured.

keyMoments.title: Inazuma Poisoned
keyMoments.description: Revolutionary Army officer Inazuma is also poisoned while trying to delay Magellan.
keyMoments.significance: Another Revolutionary Army member sacrifices themselves for Luffy's escape.
